pr_title: Removed Scheduled Job API deprecated in 20.6.0 #000

timeline.message: Removed Scheduled Job API deprecated in 20.6.0 #000

timeline.bodyText: IIRC, this is still used on VSM page. Please check.

timeline.diffHunk:

   get "admin/config_xml/edit" => "admin/configuration#edit", as: :config_edit

replies.bodyText: I dint see the analytics controller, hence I removed it. Will check.
